intro.p: Let's look at the following two-way table of Olympic medals counts in ice-skating from the top four ice-staking countries. The medal level and country of origin were recorded for each medal winner.
Make sure to show your computations and to give reasons ( in words) about how you came up with your answers. Failure to show all computations may result in a score of "not mastered".

content.p: Calculate the totals for the cells labeled A, B, and C in the table.
What is the probability that a randomly selected medal was won by {{place1}}?
What is the probability that a randomly selected medal was NOT a {{color1}} medal?
Of the medals won by {{place2}}, what is the probability that a randomly selected medal was {{color2}}?
Of the {{color3}} medals, what is the probability that a randomly selected medal won by {{place3}}
